text:
This question is part of repeated scenario questions that contain the same stem but with a different solution for each question. You need to identify if the given solution solves a particular problem. Each set of repeated scenario questions might contain either none, one, or many solutions.
You have a list of customers in an Excel spreadsheet and a Sales table in on-premises SQL Server. You need to combine the two into a single table of only the customers who have not purchased any product. Finally, load this data into Power BI. Ensure that you minimize the size of the data model.
Based on the given scenario, choose the correct set of options:
How do you combine the Customer & the Sales table?
/Table1/
What join kind would you perform? (Assume Sales is the right table)
/Table2/
What would you do to the original two queries?
/Table3/
You choose Merge Queries, Left Outer, & Leave them untouched
Does the solution solve the problem?

This question is part of repeated scenario questions that contain the same stem but with a different solution for each question. You need to identify if the given solution solves a particular problem. Each set of repeated scenario questions might contain either none, one, or many solutions.
You have a list of customers in an Excel spreadsheet and a Sales table in on-premises SQL Server. You need to combine the two into a single table of only the customers who have not purchased any product. Finally, load this data into Power BI. Ensure that you minimize the size of the data model.
Based on the given scenario, choose the correct set of options:
How do you combine the Customer & the Sales table?
/Table1/
What join kind would you perform? (Assume Sales is the right table)
/Table2/
What would you do to the original two queries?
/Table3/
You choose Merge Queries as New, Left Anti, & Disable Enable Load
Does the solution solve the problem?

While importing data into Power BI, you have to remove columns with column names that start with the prefix Test_ as shown below (Not all columns displayed).
/Table1/
Given below is an incomplete M query. Choose the correct options that complete the M query to accomplish the required task.
/Table2/
Which Power BI license type enables Power BI content to be hosted on a custom application outside the Power BI web portal?
Multi = 2, 4 / Which of the following statements are true for dashboards and reports?
choices: Reports can have only a single page while Dashboards can have multiple pages.
Both Dashboards and Reports can have multiple pages.
Both reports and dashboards can be refreshed to display the latest data.
None of these statements are true
Dashboards can have only a single page while reports can have multiple pages.

text: Multi = 0, 1, 3 / Which of the following Azure Cognitive Services models can be called through the AI insights feature in Power BI Desktop?
Which of the following is not a core component of Q&A Visualization?
choices: An icon that can be selected by the users to automatically create a custom tooltip
An icon that users can select to convert the Q&A visual into a standard visual.
A pre-populated list of suggested questions.
The question box, where users enter their question and are shown suggestions to help them complete the question.

text: Microsoft Information Protection sensitivity labels allow users to classify sensitive/critical content in Power BI without impacting productivity or interoperability. These sensitivity labels can be applied to which of the following elements of the Power BI service?
In Power BI, the _____ number refers to how many different values there are in a column, once duplicates are excluded.
Which of the following statements about data models in Power BI is false?
choices: Too many tables can sometimes cause functional issues.
Data models that have more tables are easier to navigate.
Every column that isn‘t needed should be removed from your data model.
Too many tables can sometimes lead to report inaccuracies.

text: Which of the following data sources can be connected through the “Get Data“ option in the Power BI Desktop?

Multi = 0, 2, 3, 4 / Which of the following elements are saved when you create a bookmark? (Choose four answers)
Name of the display folders that are being used to organize the fields
choices: Slicers with slicer type and slicer state

text: What is the second parameter in the DAX function PATHITEM?
choices: the name of the field you‘re interested in
the level you want to be returned
the text path describing the hierarchy

text: Multi= 1, 2, 3 / Which of the following are the right contexts for using the Funnel charts in Power BI? (Choose three answers)
choices: To show the beginning and ending headcount for the organization in a year.
To reveal bottlenecks in a linear process.
When there are at least 4 stages and data flows among them sequentially.
To calculate a possible outcome like revenue, sales, deals, etc by stages.

text: In Power BI, _____ show the shape of the data whether the distribution of values is uniform, or if some values appear more frequently than others.
Which of the following chart is the great choice to identify or display the outliers?
True or False: Row-level security (RLS) cannot be applied in Power BI Desktop when connecting via a live connection to Analysis Services; this must be set within the AS model.

Multi = 0, 3 / You have a 4-page report. Each page consists of slicers applied to the same 4 fields. Users find that selecting a slicer value on one page does not update the display on all pages. You need to add the functionality to filter the result on all pages after users have selected a value. Which of the following solutions is possible in this scenario?
choices: Sync the slicers across all the pages
Use page level filters instead of slicers
Use visual level filters instead of slicers
Use report level filters instead of slicers

text:
EMPLOYEES is the table with the following columns:
Employee_id, Department_id, Department_name, Payment.
Created a report with a stacked bar chart showing the number of employees by department name.
Now you want to customize the information in the chart visualization tooltip.
In this case, what is the first step you need to take?
choices: Set either Employee_id or Department_name as Tooltip field.
Set column  Department_name as Tooltip field.
Set column  Employee_id as Tooltip field.
Create a new report page and set this report page as Tooltip.

text: Multi = 1, 2 / Which of the following statements are true about data granularity? (Choose two)
choices: Data granularity represents the type of values contained by the data
Higher data granularity, greater the level of detail within the data
Data granularity represents the level of the details represented within the data
Data granularity represents the relationships among the various data entities

text: The data profiling feature of Power BI Desktop sits in the _____ function.
In Power BI, the _____ number refers to how many values occur exactly once.

Multi = 2, 3 / You need to import a large data set into the Power Query editor. You want to check whether a column consists only of unique values. Which of the data preview options listed below can be used for your purpose? (Choose two answers)
Which of the following statements is true?
choices: Dimension tables store information about business entities and fact tables store observation data, i.e. information about business events.foo
Fact tables and dimensional tables are just like synonyms. They represent the same thing.foo
Fact tables store information about business entities and dimension tables store observation data, i.e. information about business events.foo

text: Consider a scenario with two tables. One table is EMPLOYEES, which contains employee details in the columns emp_name, address, emp_id and joining_date. The other table is PROJECTS with emp_id, project_id and start_date columns. The HR department is now interested in having the data of the employees and the projects they work on in a single table. Which of the following operations would you perform?
When opening a query in Power Query Editor, you want to know the percentage of empty cells or values in each column as soon as possible. Which of the following data preview options would you choose?
True or False: The data model affects the time required to update the model, but once the model is loaded into memory, it has no effect on the performance of the reports.

You build a report to help the sales team understand its performance and the drivers of sales.The team needs to have a single visualization to identify which factors affect success.Which type of visualization should you use?
choices: B. Line and clustered column chart

text: You want to show the percentage breakdown of different product categories in a sales report. Which chart type would be best to use?
What is the difference between a workspace and a dataset in Power BI?
choices: A. Workspaces contain reports, datasets contain data
B. Workspaces contain data, datasets contain reports
C. Workspaces and datasets are the same thing
D. Workspaces contain dashboards, datasets contain reports

text: What is the purpose of a data source in Power BI?
choices: To define the location and format of data
To define the location and format of a report
To define the location and format of a visualization
To define the location and format of a dashboard

text: 10. How can you share a Power BI report with external users?
choices: By publishing the report to the Power BI service and sharing it with external users
By exporting the report to PDF and emailing it to external users
By creating a new workspace and inviting external users to it
By using the Power BI Gateway to share on-premises data with external users

text: You have a Microsoft SharePoint Online site that contains several document libraries. One of the document libraries contains manufacturing reports saved as Microsoft Excel files. All the manufacturing reports have the same data structure. You need to use Power BI Desktop to load only the manufacturing reports to a table for analysis. What should you do?
choices: A. Get data from a SharePoint folder and enter the site URL Select Transform, then filter by the folder path to the manufacturing reports library.
B. Get data from a SharePoint list and enter the site URL. Select Combine & Transform, then filter by the folder path to the manufacturing reports library.
C. Get data from a SharePoint folder, enter the site URL, and then select Combine & Load.
D. Get data from a SharePoint list, enter the site URL, and then select Combine & Load.

text: You have a table that contains sales data and approximately 1,000 rows.You need to identify outliers in the table.Which type of visualization should you use?
How can you share a workspace with external users in Power BI?
choices: A. Add external users to the workspace
B. Share a dashboard with external users
C. Share a report with external users
D. Use a guest account to share the workspace

text: How can you ensure data accuracy before analysis?
What is the purpose of the Power BI Report Server?
choices: To allow users to host and view Power BI reports on-premises
To allow users to create custom visuals
To allow users to share reports with others
To allow users to create dashboards

text: You have five sales regions. Each region is assigned a single salesperson.You have an imported dataset that has a dynamic row-level security (RLS) role named Sales. The Sales role filters sales transaction data by salesperson.Salespeople must see only the data from their region.You publish the dataset to powerbi.com, set RLS role membership, and distribute the dataset and related reports to the salespeople.A salesperson reports that she believes she should see more data.You need to verify what data the salesperson currently sees.What should you do?
choices: A. Use the Test as role option to view data as the salesperson‘s user account.
B. Use the Test as role option to view data as the Sales role.
C. Instruct the salesperson to open the report in Microsoft Power BI Desktop.
D. Filter the data in the reports to match the intended logic in the filter on the sales transaction table.

text: 9. What is the purpose of the Power BI Gateway?
choices: To allow on-premises data to be accessed by Power BI
To provide a way to share reports and dashboards with external users
To schedule data refreshes for reports and dashboards
To create custom visuals for reports and dashboards

text: You have a Microsoft Power BI report. The size of PBIX file is 550 MB. The report is accessed by using an App workspace in shared capacity of powerbi.com.The report uses an imported dataset that contains one fact table. The fact table contains 12 million rows. The dataset is scheduled to refresh twice a day at 08:00 and 17:00.The report is a single page that contains 15 AppSource visuals and 10 default visuals.Users say that the report is slow to load the visuals when they access and interact with the report.You need to recommend a solution to improve the performance of the report.What should you recommend?
choices: A. Change any DAX measures to use iterator functions.
C. Replace the default visuals with AppSource visuals.
D. Split the visuals onto multiple pages.
